title: Nah its official just not fucking playing ranked anymore period.
body:
The dipshits have come back, no wonder i was winning games, people were taking it seriously.

But now that its the weekend, look who crawls out of the fucking woodwork, little 13 year old fucking shitstains, treating flex queue, the only fucking queue i can play since my solo q mmr is trashed to the point of being a literal fucking mmr black hole (yeah thanks riot, for not using dynamic queue mmr for flex, and adding new mmr like you did with flex, for solo) where you get on average 4 fucking 1/15 team mates per fucking game, like norms.

Fucking norms.

So riot, when are you going to do these things.

fix matchmaking, add tribunal back, give us the fucking ability to report people who dont take ranked seriously, ranked 3's, show us our mmr again, sandbox mode, troll island, give us our fucking game back and stop treating it like an over-glorified fucking cash cow.

oh and lastly GIVE US A FUCKING DRAFT PICK NORMS SINCE HALF THE FUCKING %%%%S RUINING RANKED ARE ONLY PLAYING RANKED BECAUSE THERES NO FUCKING DRAFT PICK.

Anyway youve lost a loyal fucking customer.

And not just any customer, im one of those "whales" people talk about, like im talking across my accounts ive probably spent 5 grand on league.

i kinda wish i could get a fucking refund on it all becuase frankly with all the fucking devolving the game has done, you dont fucking deserve my money anymore.

You dont fucking deserve anyones money until fix the fucking game, and fix the fucking community.

replies.body: Nah. I shall see your  ranked complaint post within a week. ;^)

After browsing through your op.gg it appears that you're not actually that good yourself, you've been bronze for 2 years now with over 1000 ranked games, do you really think that you're just some cursed person who doesn't belong in bronze? No in actual fact you're in bronze because you are bronze, you play like a bronze and you act like a bronze, and until you improve you will stay bronze, blame your team, blame your connection but the only person to blame is yourself.
I mean if we are being honest, Season 6 doesn't mean anything.

I was bronze in season 5 aswell, the difference is i was high lp bronze 1 on the cusp of silver.

Season 6 i was bronze 5.

Seasons 1-4 i didnt play ranked only bots and normals.

Agreed. LoL hasn't really been as fun for me since the end of Season 4. Players seem to be far more unskilled at simple war strategy games, probably because the popularity of LoL has increased leading to more kiddies taking up the game. This, combined with Riot's multiple balls-ups in Season 6 meant the fun factor was at an all time low.
